item.title: KVM Malware Lab Guide
item.description: This is my guide for setting up your very own malware lab using KVM. Before you start, this guide assumes you have an AirVPN subscription or another equivalent one, which provides a .ovpn file. NOTE: I like to have internet enabled on my analysis VMs and this comes with extra security considerations and potential risk if you do not perform the setup correctly. It is recommended that you have your KVM host machine on a DMZ.
